title: Spotify Assistant
description: An ESP32 project allowing you to display your current Spotify song information onto a TFT display, using the Spotify API.

title: Custom Macropad
description: Designed a custom 3X3 matrix PCB for a macropad, optimizing layout for efficient keypress registration and durability.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Designed and developed a portfolio website utilizing React.js. Integrated a 3D Model Viewer with camera controls and auto-rotate

title: The Heart That Fed
description: Game Entry for the BIGMODE Game Jam 2025. Resource management game with the theme of 'Power'. Created using Godot in collaboration with SleepWalker Studios

title: Wirless Keyboard PCB
description: Custom designed PCB on Altium Designer for a Wireless Bluetooth 60% Keyboard using an ESP32 as the brains. Integrating a TP4056 for a rechargeable battery using USB-C
